item.description:
Guest speaker will be Stephanie Davis, who launched Patriot Games Media in 2007 as a way to indulge her twin passions of politics and talk radio. Since its launch, she has conducted more than 200 broadcasts and interviewed dozens of public figures including John Bolton, Grover Norquist, Barbara Anderson and Scott Brown.

She will be discussing the following:
1) The importance of state-based organizing activity
2) Boston Political Data Scientists
3) Field Experiences gathering signatures for US Senate
4) Action steps...

Also Worcester Tea Party's John Niewicki will join us to talk about the Mandate Amendment project.
item.name: Boston Meeting - Greater Boston Tea Party
